articles.description: NBA's Cavaliers, Nuggets and Trail Blazers plan to open practice facilities for workouts Friday, but Golden State won't open until June 1 at earliest.
articles.content:
USA TODAY Sports' Jeff Zillgitt breaks down how NBA teams are on different timelines to reopen practice facilities.

articles.title: Minor League Baseball pitcher Blake Bivens says he found out his family was killed over Facebook - CNN
